Nerangs.ab: yaϑā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan ēn gyāg sāzišn ud zōhr hamāg bē nigerišn ud ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn
"He should recite four yaϑā ahū vairiiō. At this moment, he has to inspect all the implements and the zōhr and (the rāspīg) has to give a piece of ēsm and bōy to the fire."
u-š čahārom bār xūb bē nigerišn bēd kū guft kū pad yatāhūweryō pad š́iiaōθənanąm čahār-gānag pad harw ēk bār bē nigerišn pas abastāg rāyēnišn
"He has to gaze (at them) a fourth time. There is one who said. At the Yatāhuwairyō, he has to gaze once at one of the four š́iiaōθənanąm. Then he has to arrange the abastāg."

Quotations.ab:
NērangVVrS0.14 (Nērang ī āb) [mss. 4000 4010 4020 4025 4063], cf. WiD, Revāyat of Kāma Bohra (MU1, p. 5I. 77) and Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. b.) (MU1, p. I. 584), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
(Pahl.) u-š čahārōm xūb be nigerišn bawēd kē guft pad yadāhuwēryō pad š́iiaōϑininąm čahār-ganag pad harw ēk bār bē nigerišn
"And four the fourth time they should look well. There was one who said that at yaϑā ahū vairiiō at the four š́iiaōϑananąm they should look each time."

Revāyat of Behdin Ǧāsā (MU1, p. I. 593), cf. Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. a.) (MU1, p. I. 581), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
(AvPerTr.) is̱ā ahu vairiyo (Per.) cahār behar (AvPerTr.) is̱ā ahu vairiyo (Per.) be (AvPerTr.) šiyus̱anām. (Per.) gomiz benegarešn va (AvPerTr.) anghiyuš mazdāy (Per.) āb benegarišn beʾin cahār (AvPerTr.) is̱ā ahu vairiyoš (Per.) incenin konand
"(They should recite) four yaϑā ahū vairiiō. At each yaϑā ahū vairiiī, at š́iiaōϑananąm they should look at the urine and (at) aŋhə̄uš mazdāi they should look at the water. At each four yaϑā ahū vairiō they should perform the same way."
